services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of services, tailored to meet your unique needs.

banner1.title: Safety First
banner1.description: A priority for us is to ensure the safety of our passengers.

banner2.title: Comprehensive Services
banner2.description: Services tailored to meet your unique needs.

banner3.title: Reliable Chauffeurs
banner3.description: Our chauffeurs are experienced and professional.

banner4.title: 24/7 Availability
banner4.description: We are available 24/7 to meet your needs.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: We are a luxury transportation company, dedicated to providing excellent and comfortable services to our clients.
about.description: We are a reference in Portugal for services of excellence in drivers and chauffeurs. Our commitment is to exceed the expectations of each client, which sets us apart as the distinctive choice for all transportation needs.

fleet.title: Our Fleet
fleet.subtitle: We have a fleet composed of the most luxurious and comfortable vehicles, ensuring a pleasant and safe journey.

contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.subtitle: Book your next trip with us and experience excellence in travel.

hero.title: Services to meet your needs
hero.description: Time, comfort and privacy are some of life's greatest luxuries, and when combined with a remarkable and trustworthy Private Driver Service, perfection is achieved

executive.title: Executive
executive.subtitle: Professional, reliable and efficient service for your business needs
executive.firstDescription: We ensure timely and professional transport services, allowing you to focus on your business matters without any distractions or delays.
executive.secondDescription: With extensive experience and a commitment to excellence, we cater to your specific business requirements, ensuring every trip is smooth and productive.

weddings.title: Weddings and Events
weddings.subtitle: Regardless of the question, the answer will always be yes
weddings.firstDescriptionTitle: Memorable Journeys for Your Big Day
weddings.firstDescription: We handle all the logistics, so you can cherish every moment of your special day without any stress or concerns.
weddings.secondDescription: Our dedicated team, with years of experience, ensures that every aspect of your event transportation is perfectly planned and flawlessly executed.

tours.title: Tours
tours.subtitle: Comfortable, knowledgeable and personalized for your adventures
tours.firstDescription: We provide comfortable and convenient tour services, allowing you to explore and enjoy without worrying about the details.
tours.secondDescription: With a deep understanding of the local area and a passion for excellent service, we ensure your tour is informative, enjoyable, and memorable.
thirdDescription: Porto Tour - THE CITY OF ROMANCE AND UNMISTAKABLY, WINE
Coimbra Tour - THE CITY OF KNOWLEDGE AND WISDOM
Óbidos, Batalha, Alcobaça and Nazaré Tour - THE MEDIEVAL HERITAGE
Fátima Tour - THE CRADLE OF PORTUGAL'S FAITH
Sintra / Cascais Tour - THE ROMANTIC EDEN
Lisbon City Tour - THE PORTUGUESE CITY OF SEVEN HILLS

nightLife.title: Night Life
nightLife.subtitle: Discreet, reliable and attentive service to unparalleled needs
nightLife.firstDescription: We take care of driving, parking and other details, so you can fully enjoy the moment and give attention to those you love most, without worries.
nightLife.secondDescriptionTitle: Experience and Dedication to Your Service
nightLife.secondDescription: With years of experience and an unwavering commitment to excellence service, we guarantee that every detail of your night is carefully planned and executed.

hero.title: Discover our fleet of luxury vehicles
hero.description: We guarantee memorable trips with comfort and safety, with our luxury fleet composed of Mercedes models equipped with everything you need for a pleasant and safe journey.

banner.title: Because we also depend on them, we only trust the best of the best

header.title: Know our fleet
header.subtitle: We have a fleet composed of the most luxurious and comfortable vehicles, ensuring a pleasant and safe journey.

eClass.description: The Mercedes-Benz E-Class is a luxury vehicle that combines elegance, comfort, and cutting-edge technology.

sClass.description: The Mercedes-Benz S-Class epitomizes luxury and comfort, offering an unmatched trip experience.

eqe.description: The Mercedes-Benz EQE is a luxury electric vehicle that delivers efficient performance and advanced technology.

eqs.description: The Mercedes-Benz EQS redefines electric mobility with luxury and innovation.

eqsSuv.description: The Mercedes-Benz EQS SUV combines luxury, efficiency, and an elegant design in an electric vehicle.

vClass.description: The Mercedes-Benz V-Class offers luxurious space and comfort, perfect for group travel.

sprinter8.description: The Mercedes-Benz Sprinter 8Pax is a versatile and spacious vehicle, ideal for group trips.

sprinter16.description: The Mercedes-Benz Sprinter 16Pax is perfect for larger groups, combining space, comfort, and versatility.

hero.title: We are changing the way people travel
hero.description: Our commitment is to exceed the expectations of each client, which sets us apart as the distinctive choice for all transportation needs.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: You can rely on us to deliver exceptional service and prioritize your safety and satisfaction every step of the way.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Enjoy your journey knowing that your personal space and information are respected and protected at all times.

comfort.title: Comfort
comfort.description: Our luxury vehicles and attentive service ensure a smooth and enjoyable ride from start to finish.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: From our meticulously maintained fleet to our professional drivers, excellence is our standard.

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.description: Sit back, relax, and let us handle all the details, so you can focus on what matters most to you.

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: We adhere to the highest safety standards, providing secure and reliable transportation.

foundation.title: Foundation
foundation.description: Our foundation took place in 2000, with the aim of providing luxury transportation services to clients in Portugal.

growth.title: Expansion
growth.description: Since our inception, we have expanded our fleet and services, becoming a reference in the luxury transportation industry.

green.title: Green Strategy
green.description: We are committed to reducing our carbon footprint, implementing ecologic practices and vehicles in our fleet.

present.title: Continued Excellence
present.description: We continue to provide excellent services to our clients, ensuring safe and comfortable trips.

hero.title: Contact us and book your next trip with us
hero.description: We are available 24/7 to meet your transportation needs, ensuring safe and comfortable trips.

contacts.title: Book your next trip
contacts.subtitle: Contact us to book your next trip and experience excellence in travel.

faqs.title: Faqs
faqs.subtitle: Looking for more information? Check out our frequently asked questions.

question1.question: How can I book a service?
question1.answer: You can book a service through our website, by filling out the contact form or by calling our number.

question2.question: What payment methods are available?
question2.answer: We accept payments in cash, credit card and bank transfer.

question3.question: Do your drivers speak other languages?
question3.answer: Yes, our drivers are fluent in several languages, including English, French and Spanish.

24/7.title: 24/7 Customer Support
24/7.description: We are available 24/7 to meet your needs.

footer.description: Services of excellence with quality and unparalleled comfort to meet unique needs.
